instructions: Open a contact, then tap Edit . Tap the the relevant phone number type to add or modify. When you reach the point where you'd ordinarily wait for a phone-tree prompt, tap the +*# button (located in the lower-left corner of the screen). A set of new options appears on the screen. Place the cursor is at the end of the phone number (with no space after the phone number), then tap Pause. You'll see a comma. Continue the remainder of the dialing sequence. Tap Done to save your changes.
